Articles.Content:
SYSTEM SPECS

Intel i7 2600k

P8Z68-PRO

16G DDR3

GeForce GTX 580

WIN 64x Pro

Example Issue Reports

KSP: 1.04 Windows 32bit

Mods installed:

Problem: Game crashes when reverting mission

Reproduction steps: testing rocket on a suborbit to test payload reentry and parachutes when I revert back to assembly or to launch it crashes

Log:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/symsy49kirsn3bw/AACLWpMNOdFr5sa1mwRvo83Xa?dl=0

Mod List in the link as a screenshot
How much memory KSP.exe is using when the crash occurs?

I don't know but I narrow down the problem to this

service bay 2.5 with stack decopler inside when attach rovemate without wheels doesn't crash when attach with wheels it crashes very time you try to revert to avb or launch but if you decople the rover inside service bay during fly or on the ground it doesn't crash
